destroy.title: Delete token
destroy.description: Are you sure you want to delete this token?

restore.title: Restore token
restore.description: Are you sure you want to restore this token?

destroyMany.title: Delete {{total}} tokens
destroyMany.description: Are you sure you want to delete these tokens? This action cannot be undone.

restoreMany.title: Restore {{total}} tokens
restoreMany.description: Are you sure you want to restore these tokens?

new.title: Register token
new.description: Fill in the data below to register a new token

edit.title: Edit token
edit.description: Edit the token data by filling in the fields below

cancel.title: Exit
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to exit? You have unsaved changes, they will be lost when confirmed

exclude.title: Delete token
exclude.description: This token will be permanently deleted, are you sure you want to continue?

token.title: API access token
token.description: The token allows access to the system API. Copy and save it in a safe place. For security, it will only be displayed once.
token.warning: The documentation provides the API routes. Some of them may not be available for your plan.
